Don't plan on having fun if you buy this garbage. People say its a game of skins but you rarely get them, and other than that the game is pointless. It's old and outdated. People with 15k hours in your game as a beginner! How on Earth does that sound like fun? If you want to try and get good at the game good luck!! You'll have the same people with all those hours logged trash you the entire game or have you kicked out. Just save yourself the frustration.
This is one of the most addictive games on steam.
